div.p: A phrase level element for designating the full form of a word or phrase.

abstract, addressline, archref, author, bibref, citation, container, date, datesingle, didnote, dimensions, edition, emph, entry, event, fromdate, head, head01, head02, head03, item, label, materialspec, num, p, part, physdesc, physfacet, physloc, publisher, quote, ref, sponsor, subtitle, titleproper, todate, unitdate, unitid, unittitle
A phrase level element to designate the full form of a word or phrase that often appears as an abbreviation or acronym. Use abbr to supply the abbreviated form for indexing or searching purposes.

list.item: The related element abbr with expan, which can be used to encode the abbreviation of a name while providing the full form in an attribute for indexing or searching purposes.
